title: New Ranked System - Dodging without penalty
body:
I'm one of the players in LOL that truely LOVES the new ranked system.
But it's kinda sad about the long queue's because people either keeps dodging or simply forget to lock in picks or bans.
I'm playing in plat elo and more often than not have queue times around 15 min thanks to the numerous times people choose to leave or forget to lock stuff.

This leads me to my point. 
The new ranked system NEEDS to get some kind of penalty for people who dodge queues to avoid the role they got and try to get new one (happens to me a lot and this increases the time I have to wait) 
But for people to understand and learn to actually lock their picks/bans we need penalties as well. 
This is a matter of adaption... a very easy one indeed. 
The penalty doesn't have to be huge. 5 min wait to queue up again and -3 LP (like the old method) With increasing penalty for repeatedly failing to lock or for dodging. 

I really hope you realise how much this "no penalty" is getting abused at the moment. 
Therefore I hope to see a penalty being introduced to the new system soon.

Besides this, League Of Legends is a Legendary game and loads of fun - I like the consistant development... Keep it up Riot!

replies.body: These penalties are in place as far as I'm aware, and people have been complaining for both sides on the boards. The issue you are having I think is that there are still people getting used to it, so there are people who are only forgetting once or twice (not enough to get punished), and it's just adding up. Another month or so and everyone will be used to it and you won't really have to worry anymore most likely (we all hope at least).

I'm pretty sure that the penalties isn't in place yet. 
I had a guy in queue - he told, and I quote: "I just keep dodging till I get the position I want"
He got toplane 3 times in a row, he wanted jungle. Every time we left queue it said in chat: "(Summoner name) left the room" but yet he turned up in the next 3 queues anyway. Untill I decided to leave myself since this was going nowhere. I didn't get a penalty either. Got strait into another champion select and luckily for me the other guy wasn't there again.

Well all I know is that a lot of people have been complaining about getting low priority queue for forgetting to lock in. It could be that the system is much harsher on those who have existing leaver buster penalties from in game afk etc. I don't know enough about it I'm afraid. I know the system is working in some capacity, but in your situation it certainly seems like it's missing some people.

I would remove the name and shame as it's against board policy, but you could take it to a support ticket and see if they can look into it.

Well everything is new as well so I guess I just have to give it some time and it will be all good in a couple of months. You can't assume that something new will be released without any mistakes or issues involved or changes to come. 

Thanks for telling me to remove the name, I didn't realise it - was stupid of me.

No worries, honest mistake about the name, but checking the universal rules on the left wouldn't hurt.

It will definitely get better as people get used to the system, and if it becomes too much of a problem Riot may consider other solution sin the future. :)
